congrat.title: Congratulations!!
congrat.text: Thank you for playing the game. We hope you enjoyed playing the game and have learned more about the work ur charity offers. Please support us in any way you can. Either by donating or sharing the game with your friends and family

puzzle.title: Los de puzzel op
puzzle.text: Let op een verkeerde antwoord kost je 2 minuten!

answers.title: Vull alle antwoorden in en ontsnap!
answers.desc: Let op een verkeerde antwoord kost je 5 minuten! Je kan tussentijds je antworden ten alle tijden opslaan.

wrong_password.title: Sorry you entered the wrong password
wrong_password.text: You will be added 2 minutes to the timer

right_password.title: You guessed
right_password.text: Now the next room is open for you

confirm.title: Confirmation popup
confirm.text: You can open a hint that will help you solve the room password, but for this, 2 minutes will be added to your timer. Do you agree?
